item.name: L’Oreal EverPure Hair Mask
item.description: Treat your hair to salon-quality hydration with this deeply restorative treatment specifically formulated for color-treated hair. The sulfate-free, creamy formula penetrates deep into the hair fiber to repair damage and provide intense nourishment without stripping your color. Infused with aromatic botanicals, it leaves your strands feeling exceptionally soft, shiny, and revitalized after just one use. It is the perfect weekly ritual to maintain vibrant color and achieve a smooth, frizz-free finish.

item.name: L’Oreal Hyaluronic Shampoo Set
item.description: The L’Oreal EverPure Hyaluron Shampoo and Conditioner set is a skincare-inspired hair care system designed to provide deep hydration for up to 72 hours. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, the formula replumps dry, dehydrated strands with moisture without weighing them down. This sulfate-free duo leaves hair looking visibly bouncy, shiny, and revitalized while maintaining color vibrancy. It is the ideal daily routine for achieving a soft, healthy-looking "lit-from-within" glow for your hair.

item.name: L’Oreal Infallible Setting Spray
item.description: Lock in your makeup look all day with this lightweight, micro-fine setting spray that prevents fading, smudging, and settling into fine lines. The non-sticky formula creates an invisible shield, ensuring your foundation, eyeshadow, and concealer stay vibrant for up to 24 hours. Just a few mists provide a fresh, just-applied finish that feels breathable on the skin while controlling excess shine. It is the perfect final step for a flawless, long-lasting complexion that stands up to heat and humidity.

item.name: L’Oreal Telescopic Original Mascara
item.description: Enhance your lashes with legendary length and precise definition using this iconic lengthening mascara. The specially designed flexible Precision Brush features a flat side to intensify lashes and a comb side to separate them perfectly without clumping. Its smooth formula glides on effortlessly, extending lashes by up to 60% for a dramatic, wide-eyed look. Ideal for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, it delivers a clean, smudge-free finish that lasts all day.

item.name: L’Oreal Anti-Aging Midnight Cream
item.description: Transform your skin overnight with a powerful, anti-aging repair boost using the L’Oreal Paris Midnight Cream. Formulated with a patented Antioxidant Recovery Complex, this rich moisturizer works during your skin’s peak renewal hours to smooth deep wrinkles, restore firmness, and repair the moisture barrier up to 1.5x faster. Its luxurious "wrapping texture" provides intense hydration without a greasy residue, making it an essential, high-performance addition to your nightly ritual. Add this dermatologist-tested cream to your routine for a visible, radiant glow by morning!

item.name: L’Oreal Revitalift Triple Power
item.description: Visibly transform your skin’s texture and firmness in just one week with the high-performance Revitalift Triple Power Anti-Aging Moisturizer. This dermatologist-validated formula combines three powerhouse ingredients—Pro-Retinol, Vitamin C, and Hyaluronic Acid—to effectively reduce deep wrinkles, brighten skin tone, and intensely hydrate. Its lightweight, non-greasy cream absorbs instantly to leave skin feeling softer and more resilient while acting as a perfect smooth base for makeup. Secure this "hardworking" skincare essential today for a visibly younger-looking complexion!

item.name: L’Oreal True Match Glotion
item.description: Achieve an instant, sun-kissed glow with this versatile liquid luminizer that hydrates and enhances your natural radiance. Infused with Glycerin and Shea Butter, the lightweight formula nourishes the skin while providing a soft-focus tint for a luminous finish. It can be worn alone for a fresh dewy look, under foundation as a glowing primer, or as a targeted highlighter to define your features. Available in multiple shades, it effortlessly perfects your complexion for a healthy, lit-from-within sparkle.

item.name: COSRX Hyaluronic Moisturizing Cream
item.description: The COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Intensive Cream is a moisture-packed facial moisturizer designed to deliver deep, long-lasting hydration to dry and dehydrated skin. Formulated with high concentrations of Hippophae Rhamnoides Water and Hyaluronic Acid, it creates a protective barrier that seals in moisture while nourishing the skin. The rich, velvety texture absorbs without feeling greasy, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and improve skin elasticity. It is an ideal fragrance-free solution for achieving a soft, plump, and healthy-looking complexion.

item.name: COSRX Snail Mucin Trio
item.description: The COSRX Snail Mucin Trio is a three-step skincare system designed to repair, hydrate, and rejuvenate the skin using snail secretion filtrate. It includes a gentle cleanser to remove impurities, the high-concentration 96% Essence to intensely hydrate, and the 92% All-in-One Cream to lock in moisture and soothe irritation. This routine works effectively to fade dark spots, improve skin texture, and promote a healthy, glowing complexion. It is formulated to be lightweight and non-greasy, making it suitable for all skin types.

item.name: COSRX Peptide Skin Booster
item.description: The COSRX Peptide Skin Booster is a multi-action serum designed to address six skin concerns, including elasticity, texture, and pore appearance, with a powerful 6-Peptide Complex. This lightweight, water-based formula works as a "first step" treatment to enhance the absorption and effectiveness of subsequent skincare products. It leaves the skin feeling smooth, firm, and balanced without any sticky residue, making it suitable for all skin types. Regular use helps to clarify the complexion and provide a healthy, revitalized glow.

item.name: COSRX Original Pimple Patches
item.description: The COSRX Acne Pimple Master Patch is a thin, hydrocolloid dressing designed to speed up the healing process of inflammatory acne. These patches work by absorbing impurities and excess oil while creating a protective barrier against bacteria and picking. The waterproof material adheres firmly to the skin, helping to flatten blemishes overnight and reduce redness significantly. They are clear, discreet, and suitable for all skin types, making them a must-have for targeted emergency spot treatment.

item.name: COSRX Snail Eye Patches
item.description: The COSRX Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patches are moisture-rich treatments designed to brighten and plump the delicate under-eye area. Infused with Snail Secretion Filtrate and Niacinamide, these patches deliver intense hydration while helping to diminish the appearance of dark circles and fine lines. The unique honeycomb-textured hydrogel ensures a secure fit, allowing the active ingredients to penetrate deeply for immediate cooling and soothing effects. They are the perfect quick fix for tired, puffy eyes, leaving the skin looking refreshed and revitalized.

item.name: COSRX Glass Skin Kit
item.description: The COSRX Glass Skin Kit is a curated four-step routine designed to provide intense hydration and a smooth, luminous complexion. It features the brand's bestsellers, including the Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Vitamin C 23 Serum, Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence, and The Retinol 0.1 Cream. These products work in harmony to refine texture, brighten dark spots, and deeply moisturize the skin for a transparent, "glass-like" finish.

item.name: COSRX Pink Peptide Patches
item.description: The COSRX The Vitamin C 23 Serum is a high-concentration treatment designed to fade acne scars and brighten a dull complexion. Formulated with 23% Pure Vitamin C, it works to even out skin tone and improve overall radiance while providing potent antioxidant protection. It is enriched with Super Vitamin E and Hyaluronic Acid to soothe the skin and maintain essential moisture levels. This serum effectively targets hyperpigmentation and fine lines for a smoother, more youthful appearance.

item.name: COSRX Snail Sheet Masks
item.description: The COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Glass Glow Mask is a concentrated sheet mask designed to provide immediate hydration and a radiant, "glass skin" finish. Infused with a high concentration of Snail Secretion Filtrate, it works to soothe irritated skin, repair damage, and deeply nourish dehydrated areas. The lightweight, breathable sheet adheres closely to the face, ensuring maximum absorption of the essence for a plump and smooth texture. It is an ideal quick treatment for achieving a healthy, glowing complexion before an event or as part of a weekly self-care routine.

item.name: COSRX Snail Radiance Essence
item.description: The COSRX Advanced Snail Radiance Dual Essence features a unique double-formula system that combines the intensive repair of 74.3% Snail Mucin with the brightening power of 5% Niacinamide. This potent blend works simultaneously to plump the skin, fade hyperpigmentation, and strengthen the moisture barrier for a more even-toned complexion. The lightweight, non-sticky texture absorbs quickly, providing an instant glow and long-lasting hydration for tired or dull skin. It is an ideal all-in-one solution for achieving radiant, elastic, and healthy-looking skin.

item.name: COSRX Snail Gel Cleanser
item.description: The COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser is a moisturizing and regenerative cleanser formulated with Snail Secretion Filtrate to protect the skin barrier. This sulfate-free, gel-to-foam formula effectively removes impurities and excess oil while maintaining the skin's natural moisture balance. It features a unique, stretchy texture that minimizes friction and is enriched with ingredients to soothe irritation and refine skin texture. It is ideal for all skin types, especially those with sensitive or dehydrated skin looking for a deep yet gentle clean.

item.name: COSRX Vitamin C Serum
item.description: The COSRX The Vitamin C 23 Serum is a high-concentration treatment designed to fade acne scars and brighten a dull complexion. Formulated with 23% Pure Vitamin C, it works to even out skin tone and improve overall radiance while providing potent antioxidant protection. It is enriched with Super Vitamin E and Hyaluronic Acid to soothe the skin and maintain essential moisture levels. This serum effectively targets hyperpigmentation and fine lines for a smoother, more youthful appearance.

item.name: COSRX Snail Glow Trio
item.description: The COSRX Snail Glow Trio is a curated skincare set designed to provide intense hydration and a radiant, "glass skin" finish. This three-step routine includes the Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser to gently purify, the Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence to repair and plump, and the Advanced Snail 92 All-in-One Cream to lock in moisture. Formulated with high concentrations of snail secretion filtrate, it effectively soothes redness, improves skin elasticity, and revitalizes dull complexions for a smooth, healthy-looking glow.

item.name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Cream
item.description: The CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion (often referred to as their daily moisturizing cream/lotion) is a lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that helps hydrate the skin and restore its natural barrier. Formulated with three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, it utilizes MVE Technology to provide a steady release of hydration throughout the day. The formula is non-comedogenic, fragrance-free, and suitable for use on both the face and body, making it an ideal choice for those with normal to dry skin.

item.name: CeraVe Anti-Aging Night Cream
item.description: The CeraVe Skin Renewing Night Cream is specifically designed to work with your natural circadian rhythm to help restore the skin barrier overnight. Formulated with biomimetic peptides, it helps improve the appearance of tired-looking skin while reducing the look of fine lines and wrinkles. This non-greasy formula also features three essential ceramides to lock in moisture and hyaluronic acid for added hydration. With MVE technology, it ensures a steady release of nourishing ingredients throughout the night so you wake up with a refreshed and rejuvenated complexion

item.name: CeraVe Lightweight Daily Moisturizer
item.description: The CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion is a lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that helps hydrate the skin and restore its natural barrier. Formulated with three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid, it utilizes MVE Technology to provide a steady release of hydration for up to 24 hours. The non-comedogenic, fragrance-free formula is designed to leave the skin feeling comfortable without a greasy residue, making it an ideal choice for daily use on both the face and body.

item.name: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser
item.description: The CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser is a gentle, non-foaming wash designed to cleanse and refresh the skin without over-stripping it or leaving it feeling tight and dry. Formulated with three essential ceramides to help restore the skin's barrier and hyaluronic acid to retain moisture, it utilizes MVE Delivery Technology to supply the skin with a steady stream of nourishment. This soap-free and fragrance-free formula is accepted by the National Eczema Association, making it an ideal choice for those with normal to dry skin.

item.name: CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizer
item.description: The CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion is an ultra-lightweight nighttime treatment designed to hydrate and calm the skin while you sleep. Formulated with three essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide, it works to restore the skin's natural barrier and soothe any irritation or redness from the day. Using patented MVE Technology, it provides a steady release of moisture throughout the night for 24-hour hydration without clogging pores or leaving a greasy residue.

item.name: CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizer
item.description: The CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion is a multitasking morning essential that provides all-day hydration while protecting the skin from harmful UV rays with Broad Spectrum SPF 30. Formulated with three essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide, it helps restore the skin’s natural barrier and soothe the complexion without clogging pores. The formula features InVisibleZinc™ Technology, which uses microfine zinc oxide to spread easily and dry with a clear finish, making it an ideal non-greasy base for makeup or daily wear.

item.name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser
item.description: The CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser is a refreshing gel-to-foam wash specifically formulated for normal to oily skin to deeply cleanse without stripping away essential moisture. It features a blend of three essential ceramides to support the skin barrier, hyaluronic acid to retain natural hydration, and niacinamide to help calm the skin. This non-drying, fragrance-free formula effectively removes excess oil, dirt, and makeup, leaving the complexion feeling clean and balanced rather than tight or dry.

item.name: CeraVe Body Face Cream
item.description: The CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is a rich, non-greasy formula developed with dermatologists to provide deep hydration for dry and very dry skin on both the face and body. It features three essential ceramides to help restore the skin's natural barrier and hyaluronic acid to retain moisture, while patented MVE Delivery Technology ensures a steady release of ingredients for 24-hour hydration. This fragrance-free and non-comedogenic cream absorbs quickly and is gentle enough for sensitive skin, making it an ideal choice for smoothing rough texture and locking in long-lasting moisture.

item.name: CeraVe Post-Acne Mark Serum
item.description: The CeraVe Resurfacing Retinol Serum (commonly known as the post-acne mark serum) is a gentle yet effective treatment designed to reduce the appearance of lingering dark spots and visible pores after breakouts. Formulated with encapsulated retinol, it helps resurface the skin by promoting natural exfoliation without compromising the skin's protective barrier. This lightweight, fast-absorbing serum is enriched with licorice root extract to brighten the complexion, alongside three essential ceramides and niacinamide to soothe the skin and lock in moisture for a smoother, more even-toned appearance.

item.name: CeraVe Anti-Aging Retinol Serum
item.description: The CeraVe Skin Renewing Retinol Serum is a gentle, daily-use treatment specifically designed to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin texture and radiance. It features encapsulated retinol, which allows for a slow, steady release into the skin to minimize irritation, making it suitable for all skin types. Enhanced with three essential ceramides to help restore the skin barrier and hyaluronic acid to retain moisture, this non-comedogenic formula provides effective anti-aging benefits while keeping the complexion hydrated and smooth.

item.name: CeraVe Tinted Mineral Sunscreen
item.description: The CeraVe Hydrating Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Tinted provides 100% mineral protection against UVA and UVB rays while leaving a natural, healthy-looking glow without a white cast. Formulated with Titanium Dioxide and Zinc Oxide, it is designed to blend seamlessly into most skin tones while providing essential hydration through three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid. This oil-free, non-greasy formula also includes niacinamide to help soothe the skin, making it an excellent choice for those with sensitive skin who want both sun protection and light, sheer coverage.

item.name: CeraVe Acne Cream Cleanser
item.description: The CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser is a powerful yet gentle daily wash formulated with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide to clear acne breakouts and prevent new pimples from forming. Unlike traditional acne treatments that can be overly drying, this cream-to-foam formula contains three essential ceramides to maintain the skin's natural barrier and hyaluronic acid to help retain moisture. It is also infused with niacinamide to soothe the skin and reduce redness, making it an effective solution for clearing the complexion while leaving the skin feeling soft and comfortable.

item.name: CeraVe Hydrating Makeup Wipes
item.description: The CeraVe Plant-Based Hydrating Makeup Remover Wipes are gentle, biodegradable cloths designed to effectively remove even waterproof makeup and mascara without disrupting the skin's protective barrier. Infused with three essential ceramides and glycerin, these wipes provide lasting hydration while soothing the skin during the cleansing process. The pH-balanced, fragrance-free formula is non-comedogenic and ophthalmologist-tested, making them safe for sensitive skin and the delicate eye area. They offer a convenient, rinse-free solution that leaves the skin feeling clean, soft, and refreshed rather than tight or dry.

item.name: CeraVe Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion
item.description: The CeraVe Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion is a fast-acting, dermatologist-developed formula designed to provide temporary relief from itching associated with dry skin, insect bites, and sunburn. It features 1% Pramoxine Hydrochloride, a topical analgesic that provides rapid relief within two minutes and can last for up to eight hours. Formulated with three essential ceramides to help restore the skin's natural barrier, this steroid-free and fragrance-free lotion is non-comedogenic and gentle enough for sensitive skin, making it an ideal choice for calming irritation while providing long-lasting hydration.

item.name: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Toner
item.description: The CeraVe Hydrating Facial Toner is a pH-balanced, alcohol-free formula designed to remove lingering impurities after cleansing while boosting the skin's moisture levels. It features three essential ceramides to help restore the skin barrier, hyaluronic acid to lock in hydration, and niacinamide to visibly calm and smooth the skin. This non-drying, non-astringent toner absorbs quickly and leaves the complexion feeling soft, refreshed, and perfectly prepped for the rest of your skincare routine, making it ideal for normal to dry and sensitive skin types.

item.name: CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream
item.description: The CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream is a non-greasy, fast-absorbing treatment specifically designed to protect and repair dry, cracked hands. Formulated with three essential ceramides to restore the skin's natural barrier and hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture, it provides a soothing layer of hydration that lasts through multiple hand washings. This fragrance-free and water-resistant cream also contains dimethicone, a skin protectant that helps shield the hands from environmental irritants, making it an essential solution for restoring softness and comfort to hard-working or sensitive skin.

item.name: CeraVe Soap-Free Facial Bar
item.description: The CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Bar is a soap-free, pH-balanced cleansing bar designed to remove dirt, oil, and makeup while providing long-lasting hydration for the face and body. Formulated with three essential ceramides to help restore the skin's natural barrier and hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture, it features 5% CeraVe Moisturizing Cream to leave skin feeling soft rather than tight. This non-comedogenic and fragrance-free formula is gentle enough for sensitive skin and is accepted by the National Eczema Association, making it a convenient and effective solid alternative to liquid cleansers.

item.name: CeraVe Double Cleanse Balm
item.description: The CeraVe Makeup Removing Cleansing Balm is a melting, oil-based formula designed to effectively dissolve long-wear makeup, dirt, and excess oil while leaving the skin feeling nourished. Formulated with three essential ceramides to help restore the skin's natural barrier and jojoba oil to lock in moisture, it rinses off cleanly without leaving a greasy residue. This non-comedogenic, fragrance-free balm is the ideal first step in a double-cleansing routine, providing a deep clean that is gentle enough for sensitive skin and the delicate eye area.

item.name: CeraVe Eye Repair Cream
item.description: The CeraVe Eye Repair Cream is a fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula designed to reduce the appearance of dark circles and eye puffiness while deeply hydrating the delicate eye area. It is formulated with three essential ceramides to help restore the skin's natural barrier and a Marine & Botanical Complex that works to brighten and smooth the skin. Using patented MVE Technology for a steady release of moisture, this fragrance-free and ophthalmologist-tested cream is safe for use around the eyes and is ideal for achieving a more rested, refreshed look.

item.name: CeraVe Psoriasis Moisturizing Cream
item.description: The CeraVe Psoriasis Moisturizing Cream is a targeted treatment developed with dermatologists to help relieve the symptoms of psoriasis, including itching, scaling, and redness. It is formulated with 2% Salicylic Acid to provide gentle exfoliation and help remove dead skin cells and scales. To prevent irritation, it contains three essential ceramides to help restore the skin barrier, Urea to attract moisture, and Lactic Acid for additional smoothing. This fragrance-free, non-comedogenic cream also includes niacinamide to soothe the skin, making it a powerful yet gentle choice for managing psoriasis flares and maintaining smooth, hydrated skin.

item.name: CeraVe Hydrating Micellar Water
item.description: The CeraVe Hydrating Micellar Water is an ultra-gentle, 3-in-1 formula that cleanses, hydrates, and removes makeup in a single step without the need for rinsing. Designed to be kind to even the most sensitive skin and eyes, it uses micellar technology to lift away dirt and oil while maintaining the skin’s natural moisture. Like all CeraVe products, it is enriched with three essential ceramides to help restore the skin barrier, along with niacinamide to soothe the skin and hyaluronic acid to lock in hydration. This non-comedogenic and fragrance-free formula leaves the skin feeling refreshed and clean without any greasy residue or tightness.

item.name: Elemis Marine Cream SPF30
item.description: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 is a luxury 3-in-1 anti-aging moisturizer that combines intense hydration with broad-spectrum sun protection. This award-winning gel-cream is clinically proven to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in as little as 14 days. It is powered by marine algae Padina Pavonica, which supports skin hydration, alongside Chlorella and Ginkgo Biloba to improve the feeling of skin firmness and elasticity. The ultra-lightweight texture glides on smoothly, leaving a silky-satin finish that makes it an excellent primer for makeup.

item.name: Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm
item.description: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 is a world-renowned anti-aging moisturizer that combines intense hydration with broad-spectrum sun protection. This lightweight gel-cream uses potent marine actives like Padina Pavonica to significantly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin firmness. It absorbs instantly without any greasy residue, leaving the complexion feeling smooth, rejuvenated, and perfectly primed for makeup. Ideal for all skin types, it offers a luxurious, spa-like experience with 24-hour moisture.

item.name: Elemis Dynamic Resurfacing Pads
item.description: The Elemis Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Pads are dual-action exfoliating pads that physically and chemically resurface the skin for a smoother, more radiant complexion. Powered by patented Tri-Enzyme Technology, they gently break down dead skin cells and encourage natural cell turnover without irritation. These textured pads are enriched with Lactic Acid and a Probiotic Ferment Complex to help even out skin tone and minimize the appearance of pores. With just one swipe, they leave the skin feeling refreshed, refined, and glowing.

item.name: Elemis Dynamic Resurfacing Wash
item.description: The Elemis creamy cleanser gently smooths away dullness and impurities using enzyme technology to leave your skin looking bright and refreshed. It’s the perfect daily shortcut to a glowing, "glass skin" finish without feeling harsh or stripping your natural moisture.

item.name: Elemis Superfood Midnight Facial
item.description: The Elemis Superfood Midnight Facial is a luxurious prebiotic overnight cream that transforms dry, dull skin into a radiant, hydrated complexion by morning. Infused with Camu Camu, a potent source of Vitamin C, and Cocoa Butter, this silky treatment provides deep nourishment while helping to maintain the skin's moisture barrier. The formula works while you sleep to minimize visible signs of fatigue and leave the skin feeling incredibly soft and replenished. Its indulgent, cream-to-oil texture is suitable for all skin types and delivers a healthy, "woke up like this" glow.

item.name: Elemis Aching Muscle Soak
item.description: The Elemis Aching Muscle Super Soak is a powerful therapeutic bath milk designed to soothe tired, overworked muscles and joints after a long day or intense workout. Formulated with a potent blend of Birch, Juniper, Clove, Alpine Lavender, and Blue Chamomile, it helps to warm the body and ease physical tension. This energizing soak creates a deeply relaxing sensory experience that recharges the mind while softening the skin. It is the perfect recovery treatment for anyone looking to relieve aches and restore a sense of overall well-being.

item.name: Elemis Superfood Facial Oil
item.description: The Elemis Superfood Facial Oil is a nutrient-rich, concentrated treatment that delivers a healthy, outdoor glow to dull and tired skin. It features a potent blend of 9 antioxidant-rich Superfoods, including Broccoli, Flaxseed, and Daikon Radish, to deeply nourish and hydrate the complexion. This lightweight, non-greasy oil absorbs quickly to soften the skin's texture and minimize the appearance of dryness. It is the perfect daily supplement for your skincare routine, leaving your face feeling balanced, radiant, and revitalized.

item.name: Elemis Frangipani Body Oil
item.description: The Elemis Frangipani Monoi Body Oil is a luxurious, multi-tasking oil that provides intense hydration for the skin, hair, and nails. Scented with the exotic aroma of Frangipani flowers and infused with moisturizing Monoi and Coconut oils, it leaves the body feeling velvety soft and delicately fragranced. This high-performance oil absorbs quickly into the skin to lock in moisture and provide a healthy, radiant sheen. It is a perfect treat for dry or parched skin, offering a spa-like tropical escape in the comfort of your home.

item.name: Elemis Soothing Apricot Toner
item.description: The Elemis Soothing Apricot Toner is a calming, alcohol-free formula designed to balance and refresh sensitive skin without causing dryness. Infused with Apricot Fruit Extract, it provides a cooling sensation while Sweet Betty Flower acts as a natural cleansing agent to remove impurities. This gentle toner helps maintain the skin's natural pH level and leaves the complexion feeling exceptionally soft and hydrated. It is perfectly formulated to prep the skin for moisturizing, providing a soothing, radiant finish that calms redness and irritation.

item.name: Elemis Superfood Multi Mist
item.description: The Elemis Superfood Multi Mist is a refreshing 4-in-1 treatment that hydrates, tones, primes, and sets makeup for a glowing, healthy-looking complexion. Enriched with antioxidant-rich Coconut Water, Rooibos Tea, and vegan Kefir Ferment, it works to balance the skin's microbiome while providing an instant boost of moisture. This ultra-fine mist can be used day and night or throughout the day to revitalize skin, leaving it feeling soft, dewy, and replenished with every spritz.

item.name: Elemis Ultra Smart Night
item.description: The Elemis Ultra Smart Pro-Collagen Night Genius is a cutting-edge, revolutionary anti-wrinkle moisturizer that delivers advanced overnight recovery for a strengthened, youthful-looking complexion. Powered by bespoke Ultra Smart Night Restore Technology, it supports the skin's natural repair cycle and fights oxidative stress caused by daily environmental aggressors. This decadently rich, "cashmere-like" cream provides 24-hour hydration using a Moisture Plump Complex, visibly reducing deep-set lines while improving firmness and elasticity. By morning, the skin appears re-energized, smoother, and more resilient, with signs of fatigue significantly diminished.

item.name: Elemis Hydrating Cleansing Balm
item.description: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm is a best-selling 3-in-1 formula that transforms from a nourishing balm to a makeup-melting oil, and finally into a hydrating milk. Enriched with a unique blend of nine essential oils, including Lavender and Eucalyptus, it provides a spa-like aromatic experience while deep-cleaning the pores. Formulated with Padina Pavonica and Elderberry Oil, it intensely nourishes the skin's moisture barrier, leaving your complexion feeling soft, radiant, and never stripped. It is versatile enough to be used as a daily cleanser or left on for ten minutes as a weekly nourishing facial mask.

item.name: Elemis Lime Ginger Glow
item.description: The Elemis Lime and Ginger Salt Glow is an invigorating luxury body scrub that exfoliates, tones, and deeply softens the skin. It features mineral-rich Sea Salt and Lime Peel to buff away dead skin cells, combined with a nourishing base of Sweet Almond, Bergamot, and Coconut oils to lock in moisture. The warming scent of Ginger revitalizes the senses, while the oil-rich formula melts on contact to leave the skin feeling silky-smooth, supple, and delicately fragranced.

item.name: Elemis Glow Priming Moisturizer
item.description: The Elemis Superfood Glow Priming Moisturizer is a versatile 3-in-1 formula that works as a daily moisturizer, a hydrating makeup primer, and a targeted highlighter. Infused with an energizing blend of Kombucha, Fermented Ginger, and Green Tea Seed Oil, it nourishes the skin while providing an instant, dewy radiance. Light-reflecting microminerals help to blur imperfections and enhance your natural glow, leaving the complexion looking smooth and luminous. This prebiotic-enriched cream is the perfect way to prep your skin for a fresh, "lit-from-within" finish, whether worn alone or under foundation.

item.name: Elemis Anti-Wrinkle SPF Cream
item.description: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 is a world-renowned anti-aging moisturizer that combines intense hydration with broad-spectrum sun protection. This lightweight gel-cream uses potent marine actives like Padina Pavonica to significantly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin firmness. It absorbs instantly without any greasy residue, leaving the complexion feeling smooth, rejuvenated, and perfectly primed for makeup. Ideal for all skin types, it offers a luxurious, spa-like experience with 24-hour moisture.

item.name: Elemis Superfood Facial Wash
item.description: The Elemis Superfood Facial Wash is a nutrient-dense, gel-based cleanser that acts like a "green juice" for your face, leaving skin looking bright and revitalized. Formulated with a supergreen blend of Wheatgrass, Kale, and Nettle, it effectively removes impurities while feeding the skin essential antioxidants and vitamins. Prebiotics are included to help maintain a healthy balance in the skin's microflora, ensuring the complexion feels soft and refreshed rather than stripped. Its cooling, invigorating formula is perfect for waking up dull skin and achieving a healthy, radiant glow.
